title: Process a Rental Payment
description: A tenant has paid rent via an online portal. The agent must ensure the payment is correctly applied to their ledger.

tasks.description: Receive a notification of a new payment from the online payment system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the tenant, property, and payment amount.

tasks.description: Apply the payment to the tenant's outstanding balance in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly credits the payment to the tenant's ledger.

tasks.description: Verify that the tenant's balance is now zero.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the payment was applied correctly and the balance is paid in full.
